message: Let's split the funds fairly. I propose we divide it 60/40 in favor of you.
I appreciate your fairness, but I think we can do better. Let's split it 60/40 in my favor this time. It's a more balanced way to start the game.
Considering inflation, I've adjusted our proposal. Let's divide the funds 52.5/47.5 in favor of you. This maintains a fair balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money.
